mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_REG_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_CATEGORY, ID, BOARD_REF, BOARD_LIKE_SEQ) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL,'자유게시판' ,'aaa', #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents},0, SYSDATE,'자유게시판','aaa', (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_REF), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REG_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')AS "BOARD_REG_DATE", BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_LIKE_SEQ FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE IN '자유게시판' ORDER BY BOARD_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REG_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')AS "BOARD_REG_DATE", BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_LIKE_SEQ FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_REG_DATE)AS RNUM, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REG_ID, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_LIKE_SEQ FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '자유게시판'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_REG_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY BOARD_REG_DATE DESC) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '자유게시판'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND BOARD_REG_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_REG_ID, BOARD_CONTENTS, ID, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_UPD_DATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '자유게시판' AND BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENTS = #{boardContents}, BOARD_UPD_ID = #{id}, BOARD_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
